name: Chromata: Color Warrior
description:
Theme: Only one color

This is a submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2019! This is the first game jam I've ever entered and it's even the first platformer I've ever made! It was a lot of fun figuring things out, I hope you guys like it. And please let me know your feedback, I'm open to harsh criticism so don't worry about being honest. 

A,D:                     Left, Right

W:                        Jump

1, 2, 3, 4:           Switch Color

Left Click:        Shoot Gun

You are Chromata, the Color Warrior, destined to bring color back into the world. Harnessing the power of colors you can manipulate the world properties around you. Your ability to manipulate colors is limited to only one color at a time, so you need to think about what colors you need at what time. 

Sorry, no sounds for this game.
